amendment.description: Amendment requires that all the net savings in the bill be used for deficit reduction by creating a deficit reduction lockbox into which such savings would be deposited.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require that all the net savings in the bill be used for deficit reduction. The amendment creates a so-called "lockbox" into which such savings would be deposited. The amendment prohibits using these funds for any other purpose except reducing the public debt.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 418 - 5 (Roll no. 243).
